results.title: In the Fight Over How to Teach Reading, This Guru Makes a Major Retreat
results.abstract: Lucy Calkins, a leading literacy expert, has rewritten her curriculum to include a fuller embrace of phonics and the science of reading. Critics may not be appeased.

results.title: How to Grill the Perfect Steak
results.abstract: Reverse-seared tri-tip may be the tastiest dish you grill all summer. Steven Raichlen guides you through the process.

media.caption: Reverse-searing allows thick cuts of steak, such as tri-tip, top round and porterhouse, to cook to an even doneness and develop a charred crust.
media.copyright: Andrew Purcell for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Carrie Purcell.

results.abstract: In elegantly winding articles for The New Yorker loaded with inventive imagery, he wrote more like a fan than a sports journalist.
